description: Simple, intuitive and logical every-day-usage additions to the Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 SP1 and newer. Follows the same namespace structure already found in the .NET Framework.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release which fixes a few bugs. The following work was completed for this release:

- The ParseInstance method of the Wrapper class now formats all numeric values as InvariantCulture
- The XsltPage class can now again be used without the Website dependency and now provides a way to specify default extension for physical XSLT files. Default was changed from [xsl] to [xslt]
- The BusinessEntityDataAdapter class now properly calls DeleteList as well as checking if a property is not null when dynamically setting chained property field values as part of the data binding process
- The XmlDataReader class now parses all values using the ParseXmlValueCallback method
- The ManagementUtility class now properly supports multiple results and use a comma delimiter for the values
- The HttpRouteAttribute class, which was recently introduced, has been moved from the Cuemon.ServiceModel assembly to the Cuemon.Web assembly
summary: Cuemon .NET Framework Additions is a free and flexible assembly package built to meet your potential. Limitless creativity for coders, programmers and developers.
title: Cuemon .NET Framework Additions
